actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 42.
name: David Medine
nominee: David Medine, of Maryland, to be Chairman and Member of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board for a term expiring January 29, 2018. (New Position)
organization: Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board
position: Chairman and Member of the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board
